children.name: select
Attach select event handler via bind(); detach via unbind()
Attach select event handler during initialization; detach via unbind()

children.description: Triggered when an item of a PanelBar is selected.

children.name: expand
Attach expand event handler via bind(); detach via unbind()
Attach expand event handler during initialization; detach via unbind()

children.description: Triggered when an item of a PanelBar is expanded.

children.name: error
children.description: Fires when AJAX request results in an error.

children.name: contentLoad
children.description: Fires when content is fetched from an AJAX request.

children.name: collapse
Attach collapse event handler via bind(); detach via unbind()
Attach collapse event handler during initialization; detach via unbind()

children.description: Triggered when an item of a PanelBar is collapsed.

children.name: activate
Attach activate event handler via bind(); detach via unbind()
Attach activate event handler during initialization; detach via unbind()

children.description: Triggered when an item of a PanelBar is activated.

children.name: select

parameters.name: element `String|Element|jQuery` *(optional)*
parameters.description: The **PanelBar** item to be selected, expressed as a string containing a selector expression orrepresented by a [jQuery selector](http://api.jquery.com/category/selectors/).

children.description: Gets or sets the selected item.

children.name: remove

parameters.name: element `String|Element|jQuery`
parameters.description: The **PanelBar** item(s) to be removed, expressed as a selector string, DOM element or a jQuery object.

children.description: Removes the specified PanelBar item(s).

children.name: reload
children.description: Reloads the content of a **PanelBar** from an AJAX request.

children.name: insertBefore

parameters.name: referenceItem `String|Element|jQuery`
parameters.description: A reference item to insert the new item before.

parameters.name: item `String|Element|jQuery|Array`
parameters.description: Target item, specified as a JSON object. You can pass item `text`, `content` or `contentUrl` here. Can handle anTML string or array of such strings or JSON.

children.description: Inserts a PanelBar item before the specified referenceItem

children.name: insertAfter

parameters.name: referenceItem `String|Element|jQuery`
parameters.description: A reference item to insert the new item after

parameters.name: item `String|Element|jQuery|Array`
parameters.description: Target item, specified as a JSON object. You can pass item `text`, `content` or `contentUrl` here. Can handle an HTML string or array of such strings or JSON.

children.description: Inserts a PanelBar item after the specified referenceItem

children.name: expand

parameters.name: useAnimation `Boolean`
parameters.description: _optional, default: _Temporarily enables (**true**) or disables (**false**) any visual animation(s) when expanding items.

parameters.name: element `String|Element|jQuery`
parameters.description: The **PanelBar** item(s) to be expanded, expressed as a selector.

children.description: Expands the specified item(s) of a **PanelBar**.

children.name: enable

parameters.name: enable `Boolean`
parameters.description: The desired state - enabled (**true**) or disabled (**false**) - of the targetelement(s).

parameters.name: element `String|Element|jQuery`
parameters.description: The **PanelBar** item(s) to be enabled (**true**) or disabled (**false**), expressed as astring containing a selector expression or represented by a[jQuery selector](http://api.jquery.com/category/selectors/).

children.description: Enables (**true**) or disables (**false**) the specified item(s) of the**PanelBar**.

children.name: destroy
children.description: Prepares the **PanelBar** for safe removal from DOM. Detaches all event handlers and removes jQuery.data attributes to avoid memory leaks. Calls destroy method of any child Kendo widgets.> **Important:** This method does not remove the PanelBar element from DOM.

children.name: collapse

parameters.name: useAnimation `Boolean`
parameters.description: _optional, default: _Temporarily enables (**true**) or disables (**false**) any visual animation(s)when collapsing items.

parameters.name: element `String|Element|jQuery`
parameters.description: The **PanelBar** item(s) to be collapsed, expressed as a string containing a selectorexpression or represented by a [jQuery selector](http://api.jquery.com/category/selectors/).

children.description: Collapses the specified item(s) of a **PanelBar**.

children.name: clearSelection
children.description: Clears the currently selected PanelBar items.

children.name: append

parameters.name: referenceItem `String|Element|jQuery`
parameters.description: A reference item to append the new item in the PanelBar, can be omitted.

parameters.name: item `String|Element|jQuery|Array`
parameters.description: Target item, specified as the JSON representation of an object. You can pass item `text`, `content` or`contentUrl` here. Can handle an HTML string or array of such strings or JSON.

children.description: Appends an item(s) to the PanelBar.

children.name: expandMode
children.description: Specifies how the **PanelBar** items are displayed when opened and closed. The following valuesare available:

children.name: dataSource
children.description: The data source of the widget which is used to render its items. Can be a JSON object/Array that contains an item or an Array of items to be rendered.Refer to the example below for a list of the supported properties.

children.name: contentUrls
Example - specify that the second item should be loaded remotely

children.description: Sets an array with the URLs from which the **PanelBar** items content to be loaded from. If only specific items should be loaded via Ajax, then you should set the URLs to the corresponding positions in the array and set the other elements to null.

children.name: animation.expand.effects
children.description:
A whitespace-delimited string of animation effects that are used when an item is expanded. Options include**"expandVertical"** and **"fadeIn"**.
  • Item 1
    • Sub Item 1
    • Sub Item 2
    • Sub Item 3
  • Item 2
    • Sub Item 1
    • Sub Item 2
    • Sub Item 3

children.name: animation.expand.duration
children.description: The number of milliseconds used for the visual animation when an item is opened.

children.name: animation.expand
children.description: The visual animation(s) that will be used when opening items.

children.name: animation.collapse.effects
children.description: A whitespace-delimited string of animation effects that are utilized when a **PanelBar** itemis closed. Options include **"fadeOut"**.

children.name: animation.collapse.duration
children.description: The number of milliseconds used for the visual animation when a **PanelBar** item is closed.

children.name: animation.collapse
children.description: The visual animation(s) that will be used when **PanelBar** items are closed.

children.name: animation
children.description: A collection of visual animations used when **PanelBar** items are expand or collapsed throughuser interactions. Setting this option to **false** will disable all animations.
